resources.string: "Do you really want to clear all the lines and points?"
"Apply to New Lines or all Current Lines?"
Press back again to close this app.

The basics:

Touching anywhere on the grid will create a point.

Touching again will create another point, that is connected to the first point with a line.

All points are connected to each other.

A swipe will create a point for each area of the grid touched.

The options are:

Undo
Undo the last created point and lines. This can be repeated.

Cut
Remove a point and it\'s associated lines.

Clear
Remove all lines and points.

Line Color
Change the color of all the lines, or change the color of the new lines that are going to be created.

Grid Lines
Remove the gridlines from the background.

Line Thickness
Change how thick the existing lines are, or how thick the new lines that are going to be created will be.

Grid Spacing
Change how close or wide the grid spacing will be in pixels.

Share
Share the image with friends, or save it.

Background Color
Change the color of the current background.


Notes

This application can be used in portrait or landscape mode.

Image data will be saved, for next time the application is loaded. To start over use Clear.
